text: Sore de tsuishōmono-tachi wa iu. `Moshi watashi-tachi ga imaichido hiki kaesu koto ga dekirunaraba, kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o misuteta yō ni kare-ra o misuteru nodaga.' Arrā wa kono yō ni, jibun no okonai (no kajitsu) o meiji sa reru. Kare-ra ni totte tsūkon no soto naidearou. Kare-ra wa gōka (no seme-ku) kara deru koto wa dekinai
